name: Create Zoho Recruit candidates from new Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet rows
description: Make will watch for new rows in a specified Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet at regular intervals and create candidates in Zoho Recruit using information received. The template uses this [example worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AnDK8KmbvjyFkEps-vRH2R6xSoF8?e=fNT3ux).
